stripped_text: Play only if you have not finished an action yet this turn. Gain 5 credits. If you played this operation from anywhere except HQ, gain click. click: Play this operation from Archives. After it resolves, remove it from the game.
text: Play only if you have not finished an action yet this turn. Gain 5[credit]. If you played this operation from anywhere except HQ, gain [click]. [click]: Play this operation from Archives. After it resolves, remove it from the game.
title: Petty Cash
